Frequently Asked Questions

How long does shipping take?

We roast to order and ship within 48 hours. Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days. Expedited options available at checkout.

Do you offer subscriptions?

Yes! Our subscription service delivers fresh coffee to your door on your schedule. Save 15% on all subscription orders.

What's your return policy?

We stand behind our coffee. If you're not satisfied, contact us within 30 days for a full refund or replacement.

Do you offer wholesale?

Absolutely. We partner with cafes, restaurants, and offices. Email us at wholesale@bravato.coffee for more information.

Can I visit your roastery?

Yes! Our tasting room is open Monday-Saturday, 9am-5pm. Tours available by appointment. We'd love to show you around.
